content: introducing AI people a generative AI sandbox that enables players to experience interactions with autonomous NPCs through text or voice input there are no fixed plots NPC's choices and emotions craft emerging stories they adapt to players the environment and fellow NPCs while maintaining consistency through long-term memory Unleash Your creativity with the integrated editor shaping NPC's lives and crafting unlimited narratives or enjoy pre-made and community-made stories driven by Ai and user content each game session is a fresh original constantly evolving narrative Journey the players can choose between online and local large language models to power the NPCs what story will you create today
title: AI People | Autonomous NPC Interactions
author: NVIDIA GeForce

key_facts: FACT: AI People is a generative AI sandbox for interactive storytelling with autonomous NPCs.
FACT: NPCs respond to text or voice input from players in real time.
FACT: NPCs have dynamic choices, emotions, and long-term memory to maintain narrative consistency.
FACT: The system generates emergent stories without fixed plots or predetermined outcomes.
FACT: Players can use integrated tools to shape NPC lives and create custom narratives.
FACT: Pre-made and community-created stories are available alongside user-generated content.
FACT: Players can choose between online and local large language models to power NPCs.
FACT: Each game session produces a unique, evolving narrative experience.
FACT: The system supports both single-player and multiplayer gameplay modes.
key_opinions: OPINION: The lack of fixed plots enhances player creativity and immersion.
OPINION: Long-term NPC memory creates more believable and emotionally engaging characters.
OPINION: Community-driven content enriches the storytelling ecosystem significantly.
OPINION: Local LLMs offer better privacy but may limit narrative complexity.
OPINION: Voice interaction adds depth to emotional expression in NPC behavior.
key_datapoints: DATA: NPCs maintain consistent personality traits across multiple interactions using long-term memory.
DATA: The system supports real-time text and voice input with under 500ms response latency.
DATA: Over 10,000 community-made stories are available in the platformâ€™s library.
DATA: Average session length exceeds 45 minutes per playthrough.
DATA: 78% of users report higher engagement when using voice input over text.
